name: Ocean View Apartment
description: Beautiful oceanfront apartment with stunning sea views. Features 2 bedrooms, full kitchen, and balcony with panoramic ocean vistas.

name: Modern Downtown Loft
description: Contemporary loft in the heart of the city. Minimalist design, high ceilings, and prime location near restaurants and shopping.

name: Family Garden Apartment
description: Spacious family apartment with private garden access. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and children's play area.

name: Cozy Studio
description: Perfect studio for solo travelers or couples. Fully equipped with all essentials, located in a quiet neighborhood.

name: Luxury Penthouse
description: Luxurious penthouse with private terrace, jacuzzi, and spectacular city views. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Vintage Apartment
description: Charming apartment with vintage decor in historic neighborhood. Combines classic charm with modern amenities.

name: Executive Apartment
description: Designed for business travelers. Work area, high-speed WiFi, and location near the financial district.

name: Artistic Loft
description: Loft in the city's artistic quarter, surrounded by galleries and cafes. Open spaces with abundant natural light.

name: Minimalist Apartment
description: Clean minimalist design with optimized functionality. Perfect for guests who appreciate simplicity.

name: Beachside Family Apartment
description: Family apartment just 2 blocks from the beach. Full kitchen, laundry, and all amenities for perfect vacation.

name: Bohemian Studio Iron
description: Studio with bohemian decor and relaxed atmosphere. Perfect for artists and creatives seeking inspiration.

name: Panoramic View Apartment
description: 360-degree panoramic views from the 15th floor. Modern apartment with premium finishes.

name: Townhouse
description: Two-story townhouse with backyard patio. Perfect for large groups seeking privacy and space.

name: Industrial Apartment
description: Industrial style with exposed beams and original brick walls. Located in converted factory district.

name: Eco-Friendly Apartment
description: Sustainable apartment with solar panels, water-saving systems, and eco-friendly materials. For environmentally conscious guests.

name: Classic Apartment
description: Elegant apartment with classic architecture, original moldings, and period furniture. A unique accommodation experience.

name: Tech Studio
description: Studio equipped with latest technology: smart home features, wireless chargers, and smart TV. Perfect for digital nomads.

name: Romantic Apartment
description: Specially designed for couples with private jacuzzi, fireplace, and romantic decor. Ideal for honeymoons.

name: Sports Apartment
description: Apartment with private gym and access to building's sports facilities. Perfect for athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

name: Gourmet Apartment
description: Fully equipped gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances. Ideal for cooking enthusiasts and amateur chefs.
